column4: Hi, I am looking for a media-player plugin for firefox. Kaffeine-plugin crashes firefox occasionally.
mplayer works as far as I know.
ok, I might try that. But the commandline mplayer stutters on sound playback. Don't know what causes that, except that it has something to do with alsa.
atleast that is what fixed it for me.
unless you've disabled esd then alsa should (in theory) work well.
To find out have a look-see in the miltimedia system selector in System->Administration
To set it as default add ao=oss to .mplayer/config
also you might want to set vo=xv there
Yes. Not sure what the default is, but on my system it was not scaling to full-screen correctly.
...and if you've got an ATi card and want to play mplayer video on the tv-out you need to use the gl2 video overlay (atleast that's what coolbeer told me)
I have a ati card, but don't use it for tv-out atm. I'll remember that for later. Thanks alot btw.
ah, thanks. Nice to get rid of that kaffeine-plugin. Thanks for the help
